text: {"answer": "B", "reasoning": "i is incorrect: Swiss Federal Assembly does not declare popular initiatives invalid for ECHR violations and block votes; they proceed to vote (BGE 133 I 129). ii is incorrect: Swiss res judicata (ZPO Arts. 252–254) binds only identical claims, not all subsequent disputes. iii and iv are correct (OR Arts. 18–19 for objective interpretation; ZGB Art. 458 for 2nd parentela)."}
